channel.title: 🏢 Departmento De Informática, PUC-RIO on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Departmento De Informática, PUC-RIO on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: On the cohesion and separability of average-link for hierarchical agglomerative clustering
item.description: Average-link hierarchical clustering gets a comprehensive evaluation using new criteria, showing it outperforms other methods when both cohesion and separability matter.
